org.codice.ddf.catalog.plugin.clientinfo

Class ClientInfoPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.catalog.plugin.clientinfo.ClientInfoPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreAuthorizationPlugin

    public class ClientInfoPlugin
extends Object
implements PreAuthorizationPlugin
    Injects client-specific information, if any exists for the current thread, into request properties.
